turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Mangu, Nigeria.
turn.2: Mangu, Nigeria Mangu is a Local Government Area in Plateau State, Nigeria.
turn.4: Its headquarters are in the town of Mangu at.
turn.6: It has an area of 1,653 km² and a population of 294,931 at the 2006 census.
turn.7: What are the major ethnic groups?
turn.8: The major ethnic groups are: Mwaghavul (found in Mangu (the head quarter of the local government) , Panyam, Pushit, Kerang, Mangun, Kombun, Ampang West), Pyem (found in Gindiri), Jipal (found in Kaper, Katul, Kanjing, Rundum, Bull, Zwagal, Male, Kabum, Koplar, Bwal, Kwa-Bul, ).
turn.9: What are the other ethnic groups?
turn.10: Other ethnic groups are the Kwanka (Kadung) found in Gindiri and the Mupun found in Bwanzuhum Tilengten and Jipal.
turn.12: The postal code of the area is 932.
